description: Test agent's ability to smelt iron ore into iron ingots
goal: Smelt 5 raw iron into iron ingots using the furnace and coal provided
starting_prompt: You have a furnace, raw iron, and coal in your inventory. Your task is to place the furnace, use it to smelt all 5 raw iron into iron ingots. Place the furnace on the ground, right-click it to open, put coal as fuel in the bottom slot, and raw iron in the top slot. Wait for the smelting to complete.
